nodes.text: The Tazan starport was located in Tazan City, on the low developed world Tazan. The starport neighbored Startown, the Central Business District, and Old Town. It was located half a kilometer from Desander Section, and 50 kilometers east of the Imperial Data Processing Facility on the planet. The starport had a number of temporary lodgings, retail outlets, and cantinas, such as the Happy Landing.
